body_html: Thank you for working to bring LLVM Polly optimizations to TensorFlow! Since @phawkins owns our llvm.BUILD file, I'll assign to him, since helping you accomplish this will probably be quite beneficial to the community.
body_text: Thank you for working to bring LLVM Polly optimizations to TensorFlow! Since @phawkins owns our llvm.BUILD file, I'll assign to him, since helping you accomplish this will probably be quite beneficial to the community.
